com.interpss.opf.algo

Interface BaseOpfAlgorithm

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.hazelcast.nio.serialization.DataSerializable, org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, NameTag, NetworkRef<OpfNetwork>, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseOpfAlgorithmImpl

    public interface BaseOpfAlgorithm
extends NetworkRef<OpfNetwork>
    A representation of the model object 'Base Opf Algorithm'. Implement Loadflow algorithms (NR, PQ, GS and Custome). For adjustment, there are two important concepts: 1) Adjustment at Bus/Branch level, for example, apply PVBusLimit, TapControl. LfAlgo.applyAdjustAlgo turns on/off the adjustment. This category will be done in each LF iteration step. The LfAdjustAlgorithm class is for this category. 2) NetAdjustment - some adjustments are applied outside Loadflow iteration at the Network level. When to apply might need to be controlled. NetAdjustAlgorithm class is for implementing this set of adjustments. For serialization - AclfNet object and INRSolver object are trainsient. It can be applied to single network and multiple networks Loadflow calculation.
    See Also:
    OpfAlgoPackage.getBaseOpfAlgorithm()
